data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Lincoln Beach 30m, Oregon, USA (LB30XX)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Lincoln Beach 30m, Oregon, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a Onset Tidbit V2 Temp Data Logger (Onset Computer Corp. UTBI-001) beginning 2008-07-23. The instrument depth was 001 meters, in an overall water depth of 30 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
